clues.text: In 1986 this title guy & 2 friends had quite a day, hitting a museum & doing some fine dining; he even caught a ball at a Cubs game

rounds.text: Formed in 1831 to help with the conquest of Algeria, its ranks have included Germans, Turks & Chinese
